address.p: Kindergarten registration for Regional School District 12 children turning five years of age before January 1, 2021, are eligible to be registered. A kindergarten orientation and visitation program will be scheduled in spring 2020.

article.h2: Region 12 Schools will be closed through May 20th. We are providing distance learning to our students throughout the closure.
